short_summary: Lean to procure Tie-Down, Cargo, Aircraft for a sum of 8000 unit of issue EA delivered to CAAWC Trenton in Canada.
description: See the notice URL for More and a document specifically showing more details on goods requirements met in summary item 1 and bid process delivery
full_summary:
### Aircraft Tie-Down Cargo Solicitation

**PW-22-01009681: W8485-237165/A**

**Request for Proposal: Tie-Down, Cargo Aircraft ( N1670E )**

**Published on**: October 11, 2022
**Closes on**: November 21, 2022, at 2:00 PM ET

[**View Attachments** in English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/11/9d034f1a082d25210d83e2517887136a/w8485-237165-a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf)
[**View Attachments** in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/11/2931820117b99b37864013013bcccae7/w8485-237165a_bid_solicitation_fr.pdf)

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the supply of tie-down, cargo aircraft ( N1670E ), which includes the item "Net, Cargo Tie Down (Aircraft Pallet)".

**Categories and Sub-Category**
- Collective Government Procurement
- Notes CANPAN FTAA ( Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement), NAFTA ( Trade Facilitation and Security Agreement), CFTA (Canadian Free Trade Agreement), ALEC (Accord de libre-échange canadien), CCFTA (Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement), CKFTA (Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement ), CHE (Canada-Honduras free trade agreement )

**Observations:**

* Bids must be submitted electronically to the "Canada buys" system. 
* Numerous Goods and Services No BLL associated sheets to Internet
* Industry. Communication stipulates the Minister of Defence will remain suitable for diplomatic/military  purposes. Requirements goods easily cab clipped competitive
